17.eng-name: The Book of Praying for Rain (Al-Istisqa')

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Abu Hurairah said:"The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: "Allah, the Mighty and Sublime, said: I have never sent down My favor to My slaves but a group of them became disbelievers who say; "The stars and by stars

chapter.eng-name: It is Makruh to attribute rain to the stars
